get.description: Returns information about the dataset of the last N eras.

200.description: The evolution of DOT Rewards per Region

DotRewards.description: The sum of rewarded Dots in reward events

Regions.description: The number of unique regions in reward events

Countries.description: The number of unique countries in reward events

Networks.description: The number of unique networks in reward events

ValidatorGroups.description: The number of unique validator groups in reward events

Validators.description: The number of unique validators in reward events

Nominators.description: The number of unique nominators in reward events

Eras.description: The count of eras for which rewards are present

LastestEra.description: The latest era for which rewards are present
